The hidden spark slightly reacted, barely noticeable, with another 
spark n=
earby. Each time another seemed to be nearby, it reacted ever 
so slightly.=
 
But apparently seemed to be at ease where it was encased. 
Appeared to be=
. 

Then as swifty as it reacted, it went silent. Dimly glowing as though 
=
it were sleeping so to speak... again. 
Mysterious it was. But in due time.=
.. they will know who it was this 
spark belonged to.
